creator: dschaub@douglas.co.us
text:
iPlanet-ejbc task rebuilds all EJBs irregardless of them being up-to-date or 
not. This feature worked in Ant 1.4.1 but not fails in all Ant 1.5.x releases.

creator: daveschaub@yahoo.com
text:
Created attachment 6124
Search for [PATCH] in attachment to see affected code.

creator: daveschaub@yahoo.com
text:
This bug affects you only if you have specified <iiop>true</iiop> in your ias-
ejb-jar deployment descriptor.
iPlanet is dead. If you are still using it, please upgrade to anything else.
creator: stevel@apache.org
